tag_list: foodchannel, food, social-media, kay-logsdon, compton, writer
overview: Kay Logsdon serves as Editor in Chief of The Food Channel, a food website focused on becoming a hybrid IPTV provider. People call her an experienced editor, writer, and social media specialist. She has been responsible for the design and creation of a variety of Web sites since the early 90s. She brings entrepreneurial experience from a purchasing dot.com that operated on an Oracle platform in the late 90s. Prior to coming to The Food Channel, Kay worked with strategic long-range planning and facilities management and was responsible for obtaining grants and federal appropriations. She holds a B.A. in English and Communications and an M.A. in Integrated Marketing Communications. She has previous experience as a News Director for a 100,000-watt FM radio station and as an editor and reporter in newspaper. Kay freelance writes for various publications and is a regular seminar speaker. She has demonstrated skills in public relations and promotions, strategic planning, message development and delivery, legislative support, Web site management, market research, and providing employee, board and shareholder communications.
